data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 506 believers in the county of Thoubal to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thoubal, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Thoubal to agree with you and with one another.
Father, bring yourself glory in Thoubal. Through your servants plant 9 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Thoubal, Manipur, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Murasing people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Thoubal to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Thoubal, Manipur, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Thoubal.

location.name: Thoubal
location.people_groups_list: Hrangkhol, Barman, Kanda, Chakma, Meitei Kshatriya
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hrangkhol (6,900), Barman (6,700), Kanda (2,600), Chakma (217,000), Meitei Kshatriya (119,000)
